mapper.sql: SELECT userId, friendId, relation FROM friend_tb
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO friend_tb(userId, friendId, relation, confirm) VALUES (#{userId}, #{friendId}, #{relation}, 'N')
mapper.delete: DELETE friend_tb WHERE (userId=#{userId} AND friendId=#{friendId}) OR (userId=#{friendId} AND friendId=#{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE friend_tb SET confirm='Y' WHERE (userId=#{userId} and friendId=#{friendId}) OR (userId=#{friendId} and friendId=#{userId})
